Codes: C - connected, S - static, R - RIP, B - BGP
       O - OSPF, IA - OSPF inter area
       N1 - OSPF NSSA external type 1, N2 - OSPF NSSA external type 2
       E1 - OSPF external type 1, E2 - OSPF external type 2
       i - IS-IS, L1 - IS-IS level-1, L2 - IS-IS level-2, ia - IS-IS inter a       * - candidate default

S*     ::/0 [1/0] via 2a0c:b641:2c0:140::2/128, VLAN40
C      ::1/128, lo
C      2a0c:b641:2c0:140::/64, VLAN40
C      fe80::/10, VLAN40
